headline: Business Analyst at Ksoft (Pvt) Ltd
summary: I am a Happy-go-lucky guy. Just going where my life is taking me.
organization_description_2: Q Excess Pvt Ltd, Sri Lanka is the development centre of Quantrax Corporation, USA. Quantrax owns “RMEx” - one of the best receivable management systems in the North American region. It has an automated dialler integrated to handle the inbound and the outbound calls with accounts and some of the clients currently use it with up to thousand agents. In 2012 company initiated researching and developing few innovative mobile solutions.    One of the projects was to design and develop brail system using the iPad which is a much cheaper solution compared to other available options in the market. It also links the visually impaired and blind users with cutting edge technology by providing features from its inception such as using iPads, sending emails, spell checker, supporting much difficult features like level 2 and level 3 Brailer features. As a volunteer I was assigned to research and understand their behavior and usage with the new application. I involved in the in-house testing to learn the system. Then I was included in the testing team who visited “The Ceylon School for the deaf and blind” regularly to guide the testing process. It was a very touching, but a very challenging experience to guide them and understand their thinking and behavioral patterns. Gathered information was analysed and provided as an input to the design and development process. I was to track and present the progress and evolvement of the application from user prospective as an external investigator.

ERA Insight comprises two main components, the ERA Insight Analyzer Component and the ERA Insight Server Component.  I served as a Software Engineer in the Insight-Analyzer team that develops the Java-based client tool. The ERA Insight analyzer contains open source and custom components which have extensible plug-in architecture, and includes the updater framework (centralized updates to all included components). It is used to analyze code bases and submit ERA-based reports to the Insight dashboard. As a developer in this team, I gained hands on experience in Java and Swing. The GUI of this tool is built on Swing and the component as a whole covers many aspects in Java, including Web services.

headline: IT Business Analyst
summary: I'm a highly motivated individual who is interested in moving forward with a career which has a technical business analysis / consulting background.  My passion is to succeed in a stimulating and challenging environment that will provide me with advancement opportunities by serving the organization and the public.  My work experience lead me to explore the areas of technical business analysis, functional consulting, system implementation and project management from the earliest days of my career.
organization_description_1: - DOC990  DOC990 is an online doctor channelling system with below modules. - www.doc.lk website - DOC990 mobile application - DOC990 hospital application - DOC990 agent module - DOC990 partner module - DOC990 iframe - Admin module  Reference: https://www.doc.lk/about  - National Nutrition Program for Pregnant Mothers (NNPP)  NNPP is a coupon automation system which is used to automate the welfare coupon process introduced by the government to fulfill the nutrition needs of pregnant mothers. This system will automate the processes from issuing e-voucher to payment settlements of merchants.  Responsibilities Performed as a Business Analyst  - Requirement analysis and specification. - System support with analysing and identifying business concerns raised by the client. - Frequent engagement with client regarding change requests and system maintenance. - Designing technical solutions and system processes. - User acceptance training. - Documenting system requirement specifications, use cases and other required documents. - Engagement with the team until product delivery.
organization_description_2: Infor Talent Management system (ITM) is the main executive HR System implemented across  the Brandix Group.   Responsibilities:   Support o On time system support – On time response to customer queries & system issues  raised by both system users and corporate HR. o Managing all system configurations and admin functions of the Infor Talent  Management.  o Managing, manipulating and maintaining the system database (SQL). o Configuring system process flows through Infor process designer (Approval  processes, Schedule triggers, System notifications & Alerts). o Managing, creating and manipulating SQL reports of the system.   Change Requests  o Requirements analysis and specification. o Feasibility study on change requests.  o Testing and implementation of change requests.  o Delivering change requests within the agreed timeline.
organization_description_3: HCM project is about implementing the hSenid HCM system across the Brandix Group,  encompassing standardization of relevant processes and policies to result in a single  approach to managing works HR functions. My job role includes,   Implementation  Mapping the user and business requirements to the HCM system and working  out the best way to deal with any gap in between.   o On site and off site system implementation activities and user trainings in  Accenture and plants. (Brandix Essentials Limited cluster, Brandix  Textile Limited, Brandix Green Plant). o Mapping business requirements into the system functionalities. o Creating and validating standard operational procedure documents for the  role of application admin. o Designing the process flows of “leave application through self-service  portals”. o Group admin configurations and activities of attendance, employee  information manager, and absence management and employee life cycle  modules. o Creating report specifications for different business requirements. o Master data analysis and reconciliation. o Group admin training – conducting trainings for end users and the new  project team for project continuity. o Department mapping and designation mapping. o Preparing presentations to be presented at the monthly HRM meetings.   Support  On time response to the issues logged by the users, re-routing and follow ups  with hSenid.  o On site and off site system support for Accenture and plant users. o Group admin configurations. o Following up system issues with hSenid and maintaining the 3W list. o User login creation and deactivation in accordance with the permitted  access level.  I have been able to improve in the areas of project management, business analysis, functional  consulting, team work, problem solving, decision making and customer relationship management with the exposure I had through the HCM project.

headline: Senior Business Analyst - PropTech | Bricks+Agent | JRC Software
summary: I’m a solution driven business analyst, passionate about working hand-in-hand with cross functional teams in the development providing product consultation and delivery of process innovations driving to achieve business goals. Possess a strong understanding of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC): Analysis, Design, Development, Testing and Implementation within various methodologies including Rational Unified Processing (RUP), Agile, and Waterfall methods. Having the exposure in domains such as Healthcare, Financial Markets and Real Estate, I look forward for opportunities where I can learn and grow.  Following are some of the key responsibilities that I am involved with as a Business Analyst.  Business Analysis • Customize and develop extensions that can summarize and deliver the story in an impactful and actionable manner. • Analyse requirements, document user stories, functional specifications, use cases, user guides, create wireframes. • Review Quality Assurance test cases and ensure they are in sync with the requirements being delivered. • Provide expertise on the systems limitations/capabilities as they relate to the business goals. • Perform Product demos to external stakeholders and clients. • Liaise closely with the project teams during project implementation to ensure the clear understanding of the requirements and to facilitate any requirement related clarifications.  Research and Development • Proactively research and stay up to date with the trends around emerging technologies and provide recommendations to incorporate them in the product development. • Ideate and identify new features and concepts that can be implemented into the product solving client’s business problems.  Product and Service Design • Customizing the product's functionality and implementation based on client and internal stakeholder feedback.  Business Management • Liaise between internal technology teams and business/product owners to refine, optimize and streamline deliverables that need to be incorporated in incremental product development and delivery. • Assist in planning the roadmap and the delivery of the components of product following the Agile methodology.

organization_description_1: IEEE, an association dedicated to advancing innovation and technological excellence for the benefit of humanity, is the world's largest technical professional society. It is designed to serve professionals involved in all aspects of the electrical, electronic, and computing fields and related areas of science and technology that underlie modern civilization.  IEEE's roots go back to 1884 when electricity began to become a major influence in society. There was one major established electrical industry, the telegraph, which since the 1840s had come to connect the world with a data communications system faster than the speed of transportation. The telephone and electric power and light industries had just gotten underway.  IEEE and its members inspire a global community to innovate for a better tomorrow through its more than 423,000 members in over 160 countries, and its highly cited publications, conferences, technology standards, and professional and educational activities. IEEE is the trusted “voice” for engineering, computing, and technology information around the globe.  IEEE's core purpose is to foster technological innovation and excellence for the benefit of humanity.  #IEEEBrandAmbassador

headline: Technical Business Analyst at Pearson
summary: Simply, an energetic and enthusiastic individual who enjoys challenges and achieving goals. I have developed a reputation as a hardworking individual whom one can depend on to get the job done in significantly challenging situations. Keys to my success are a strong set of skills, a demonstrated commitment to achieving goals, and a genuine interest in improving the way the job is done.   I am an experienced Business Analyst with a demonstrated history of working in an Agile based environment. I consider my experience of working as a Software Engineer at IFS R&D International as a value addition where I was able to improve my technical skills.   I was privileged to work as a board member at the chapter level in the Junior Chambers International Sri Lanka volunteer organization. This brought me opportunities to participate and organize many projects related to Business, Personality Development, Community and International sectors.
organization_description_1: Working for teams SMS (Subscription Management system) and TPI (Third Party Interoperability) as the Technical Business Analyst for the e-learning platform of Pearson. The day-to-day work includes the following (but not limited to): - Engaging with the Product Owner, and development team in requirement elicitation.  - Maintaining the JIRA backlog. - Conducting User Acceptance Testing.  - Maintaining product/release documentation and user manuals. - Creating training materials for all stakeholders including product demonstrations.  Agile-Scrum is being practised in all stages of the projects. Tools: Jira, Confluence, MS-Office, LuccidCharts, ServiceNow
organization_description_2: Managed new implementations, system enhancements and administration of the systems including but not limited to the following - Maintained the workday platform with a focus on integrations, reporting, modifications and day to day issue handling - Evaluated incoming technical system requests from Senior Management, Sales, Operations, HR, Finance, IT and other groups, Identify appropriate solutions and execute on them - Provided production support for business systems used by the internal and external users while administrating the Salesforce platform - Handled new requirements on improving the company website (Small Group Touring Company and Bunnik Tours), while working with all stakeholders including IUGO (the website development team), Salesforce, Kaptio (Salesforce CRM partner) and Trustpilot (Review partner) - Worked on the company's JSON API and while managing and supporting API integrations for 3rd party Tour Agencies (TourRadar, Tour Atlas, Global Journeys, etc.)  - Engaged in research and feasibility study, initial setup, and development of the Ceyscape e-commerce website using BuddyBoss based on the WordPress platform - Created user guiding documents for different stakeholders regarding system setup and usage - Provided support and guidance for all system users and stakeholders through hands-on pieces of training - Conducted User Acceptance Testing (UAT) for the releases made by the external software development team and Salesforce CRM partner - Actively engaged in the Business Process Modeling (BPM) of the company's work process  Creation of the website of Ceyscape.com, which is a subsidiary of Bunnik Tours. Which runs on, the base of the BuddyBoss platform on WordPress.
organization_description_3: Worked for the project “Telbiz Corporate Migration” where the existing corporate CRM system was migrated to the Dialog One-CRM system, introducing new features in addition to the existing.  Worked in gathering client requirements, communication with all types of uses of the current system.  Actively engaged in technical discussions with the Product Architects, DB Administrators, Software Engineers and QA Engineers during product design and development. Created documentation including Software Requirement Specification (SRS), Backed API validation documents, User manuals and other related documents.  Followed Agile practices during all stages of the project.
organization_description_4: Worked for product team RIDE (Rezgateway Integration and Distribution Engine), which integrates 3rd party travel itinerary APIs to the RezG travel engine.   Actively participated in: •	Requirement gathering •	Gap analysis •	Feasibility study •	Creating analysis documentation and specifications •	Maintaining the JIRA & Trello dashboards and creating and prioritizing user stories •	Issue handing and providing clarifications  Communicated with clients (Oman Air, Ethiopian Holidays, Sri Lankan Holidays, Abans, GLOCAL, etc), suppliers (Hotelbeds, GTA, Sabre, Amadeus, Infinite, Quantum, etc) and internal stakeholders (team members, product management, other related teams, etc) with regards to interface integrations and dynamic issue handling.  Some of the key API analysis includes: •	Hotel itinerary API integrations – Darina Holidays, Sal Tours, QTech APIs, Viajes Olympia •	Air itinerary API integrations – Sabre seat map •	Feature enhancements  - Hotelbeds (Hotel and Activity APIs), GTA, Sabre, Infinite) •	Payment Gateways •	Static data analysis  Agile/Scrum activities performed including: •	Creating user stories and maintaining estimations •	Backlog grooming (Product and Project backlogs separately) •	Sprint planning and issue/task prioritizing  •	Conduct daily scrum meetings •	Sprint reviews with product management team
organization_description_5: Worked in the Research and Strategy Product Group, for the Enterprise Operational Intelligence (EOI) Team. EOI is an IFS product which enables organizations to map, monitor and manage business strategy and process coherently across multiple divisions and sites with a fragmented IT landscape.   Mainly involved in the project Facelift, and worked at maintenance team where all client issues of EOI application were handled.  Technologies and Tools used: C# .NET, ASP.NET, MVC, Visual Studio, STML, SCSS/CSS3, SQL Server, TFS, GIT, JIRA  Development Methodologies used: Agile, Scrum, Kanban
